1. If the price increases from P3 to P4, the quantity demanded will increase / decrease from Q3 to Q2.

    The quantity demanded decreases, since an inverse relationship exists between the price and the quantity demanded. The decrease is from Q3 to Q2.

  2. If the price decreases from P4 to P2, the quantity demanded will increase / decrease from Q2 to Q4.

    The quantity demanded increases, since an inverse relationship exists between the price and the quantity demanded. The increase is from Q2 to Q4.
